name: Blocky Pig Simulator 3D - Pig survival
description:
Welcome to the world of blocky animals! Craft survival strategy, complete crazy quests and enjoy life in blocky world with new animals simulator. Loads of fun and challenge await in Blocky Animals World - a loony animals survival simulator!

Features of Blocky Animals World:

>LOTS OF ANIMALS - Play as pony, goat, fox, sheep, pig, horse or wolf

>QUESTS AND SURVIVAL - Funny missions of the simulator or find your own adventures

>MAKING A FAMILY - Create and raise your family of animals in survival simulator

>OPEN WORLD - Fight for survival on tho big location of the simulator

Lots of blocky animals!
Play with various blocky animals in our survival simulator - unleash blocky horse, pig, wolf, fox, sheep, goat or pony! Fight for survival in blocky world of complete unique quests for each of blocky animals on the simulator.

Open blocky world!
Simulator has two big open location - blocky city and blocky farm. Live as a horse in town or wolf on a farm or choose other blocky animals of survival simulator, like pig, goat or pony. Levelup your blocky animals, complete quests as you explore crazy world of the simulator for fun and survival!

Survival of the blocky!
In the simulator you can make a family of animals for survival! Find another horse, pig, wolf, goat or whichever animals you play as to form a her for survival in the simulator. The more crazy blocky animals are with you, the finnier is the survival in the simulator!

Pig, horse, wolf, pony, goat, fox, sheep and other animals await in Blocky Animals World - a crazy animals survival game!
